TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PackWebRequest extends System.Net.WebRequest
Public NotInheritable Class PackWebRequest Inherits WebRequest
public ref class PackWebRequest sealed : System::Net::WebRequest

Docs.summary: Makes a request to an entire or to a in a package, identified by a pack URI.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] 使用定义的包 uri 语法来引用包中包含的部分。
有关此类派生自抽象类和的请求和响应操作的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>。

Docs.value: Pack URI web 请求中使用。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.CachePolicy%2A>属性是不同于<xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A>的内部<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>返回<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>方法。

Docs.exception: The specified to set is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionGroupName { get; set; }
.property instance string ConnectionGroupName
Public Overrides Property ConnectionGroupName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ConnectionGroupName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ConnectionGroupName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the connection group.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A>属性可使该请求与连接组相关联。 应用程序向不同的用户的相同服务器发出请求时，连接组非常有用。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A>属性为空字符串，如果请求会解析从<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>缓存。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A>与内部共享属性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>(<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。

.property instance int64 ContentLength
Public Overrides Property ContentLength As Long
public: virtual property long ContentLength { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.ContentLength : int64 with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Content-length HTTP header.
Docs.value: 内容的长度，以字节为单位。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 请注意，包 URI 协议不会处理请求中的信息以外[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。 对于 （如估计发送信息的大小） 的大多数传统目的，则不需要此属性。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.ContentLength%2A> 如果请求会解析从返回 0<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>缓存。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.ContentLength%2A>与内部共享属性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>(<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。

Docs.exception: Set is not supported, is read-only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Content-type HTTP header.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 请注意，包 URI 协议不会处理请求中的信息以外[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。 对于大多数情况下 （如确定发送信息的类型），没有无需使用此属性。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.ContentType%2A> 返回一个空字符串，如果请求会解析从<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>缓存。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.ContentType%2A>与内部共享属性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>(<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the authentication credentials.
Docs.value: 要使用与请求的身份验证凭据。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对包缓存的请求使用其自己的缓存的凭据。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.Credentials%2A>与内部共享属性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>(<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。

Docs.returns: A created from the inner-URI if the request resolves to a valid transport protocol such http or ftp; or a created with a null-URI if the request resolves from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>提供对于高级的方案，则无需对于正常操作。

Docs.exception: The inner URI does not resolve to a valid transport protocol such as http for ftp, nor can the request be resolved from the .

Docs.summary: Do not use— is not supported by .
Docs.returns: If is called, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetRequestStream%2A> 存在是为了实现所需的抽象基类的协定。 Pack URI 协议不支持写入。

Docs.exception: Occurs on any call to . The pack URI protocol does not support writing.

Docs.summary: Returns the response stream for the request.
Docs.returns: The response stream for the request.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每个基类的签名<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>返回类型值<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>。 它实际上是类型的返回值<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse>特定的包 URI 协议的响应。
<xref:System.Net.WebResponse.Close%2A>应用程序完成后，应调用方法<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>流。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 包缓存请求包含有效，但却为空的在其请求中的标头集合。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.Headers%2A>与内部共享属性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>(<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the protocol method to use with the pack URI request.
Docs.value: 程序执行此请求的协议方法名称。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.Method%2A>属性返回一个空字符串，如果请求会解析从<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>缓存。 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.Method%2A>请求引用外部的 Web 请求，如 http 或 ftp 时，才设置属性。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.Method%2A>与内部共享属性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>(<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preauthenticate the request.
Docs.value: 若要发送WWW 身份验证HTTP 标头与初始请求; 否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A>属性返回`false`请求解析从<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>缓存; 没有包 URI 协议没有预身份验证方案。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.PreAuthenticate%2A>与内部共享属性<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>(<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the length of time before the request times out.
Docs.value: 请求超时前等待的毫秒数。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对包缓存的请求不会超时。请求的解析<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>缓存，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.Timeout%2A>返回值 – 1。
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.Timeout%2A>与内部请求共享属性 (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>)。
